BIOGRAPHY

The greatest teacher, failure is.
Born nine-hundred years before the Battle of Endor. A member of a mysterious species known as the Jedi Homeland: never revealed.

  • Master of Kantam Sy
  • Master of Dooku
  • Mentoring Anakin Skywalker
  • Facing the rising darkness
  • Helping the Spectres

NOTABLE ACHIEVEMENTS

Trained generations of Jedi, ultimately serving as the Jedi Order's Grand Master.

  • Defending the Republic during the Clone Wars.
  • Passing on the Jedi tradition to Luke Skywalker.
  • Becoming a leading member of the Jedi High Council.
  • Was instrumental in the defeat of the Galactic Empire and the redemption of Anakin Skywalker.
  • Unlocking the path to immortality.

Legacy

Serving as Grand Master of the Jedi Council for over 800 years and training Jedi for over 900 years, my legacy lives on through the Jedi we trained and the impact we had on the galaxy. Our wisdom, power and teachings continue to be an inspiration for those who follow the ways of the Force. We were playing a key role in the defeat of the Galactic Empire. My teachings and philosophy continue to be admired and have become iconic phrases.

EXPERIENCE

Thoughout the Universe

Trainer and mentor of many Jedi including Luke Skywalker,
Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Count Dooku

  • Served as a Jedi General in the Clone Wars;
  • Served as a member of the Jedi Council for over 800 years;
  • Trained Jedi for over 900 years;
  • Experience working from exile;
  • Discovering immortality

Vast experience as a teacher and mentor, training many young Jedi Padawans

Grand Master of the Jedi Council

  • Using telekinesis, mind control, and precognition;
  • Communicating with the force ghosts of Jedi and Sith masters;

FORMAL TRAINING

Jedi Grand Temple, Imperial City, Coruscant

Jedi Grand Master

  • Joined the Jedi Order young attuned to the Force;
  • Received training from Jedi Master N'Kata Del Gormo;
  • Retrieved a kyber crystal and constructed my first lightsaber;
  • Completed the Jedi Trials and became a Jedi Knight;
  • Became one of the most powerful Jedi in the Order.

Special Training

Force Powers, mental and physical skills

  • Certified in Telekinesis, Mind control, and precognition;
  • Trained for lightsabre combats and duels;
  • Able to communicate with the force ghosts;
  • Able to create Force Barriers;
  • Able to use the force to heal injuries and illnesses;
  • Detecting lies, emotional states, and thoughts
  • Intergalactic diplomacy
